data.expected_result: Like when clicking on the header, you are redirected to the Account Management part of the settings.
data.short_description: The redirect hint for the account management doesn't work when you click on any part of the "Use data to make Discord work" paragraph other than the header.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open settings>Privacy & Safety. - Scroll to the bottom. - Click anywhere on the "Use data to make Discord work" paragraph other than the header.
